data.title: City Council â€“ City of Wayland
data.text:
The City of Wayland operates under a City Council/City Manager form of government. The City Council, as the legislative body, represents the entire community and is empowered by the City Charter to formulate City policy. The elective officers for the City Council shall be a Mayor and six Councilmen. At the regular City election to be held in every even numbered year there shall be elected three (3) Councilmen to serve for a term of two (2) years, and a Mayor. At the regular City election held in every odd numbered year there shall be elected three (3) Councilmen to serve for a term of two (2) years.

When: Held on the first and third Monday at 7:00 p.m.

Where: City Hall, 103 South Main Street

If a meeting falls on a holiday, the meeting will be moved to the following day (Tuesday)
